scripts.dev:reveal-watch: concurrently -k -n REVEAL -c magenta "nodemon --watch src/decks --ext md --ignore src/decks/tmp-*.md --exec 'npm run build:reveal:inline'"
scripts.dev: TINA_PUBLIC_IS_LOCAL=true tinacms dev -c "concurrently -k -n DOCS,REVEAL -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:docusaurus" "npm run dev:reveal-watch""
scripts.build: tinacms build && npm run build:reveal:inline && npm run build:docusaurus
